headword: cupiō, cupere, cupīvī or cupiī, cupītus

"ought to, should"; to owe; to be obligated to
finally, at last; in short; in fact

worthy; worth, fitting [+ abl. or gen.]
to send away, send forth; dismiss; abandon

headword: locus, locī, m. (in pl. sometimes n.)

definition: middle, middle of (medium mare = “the middle of the sea”)
to wonder (at), be surprised at; admire
to mix, mingle; stir up, disturb

once (upon a time); one day (in the future)

through, along; because of; by (in oaths and prayers) [+ acc.]

definition: to seek, go after; ask; attack
